titleHead: [CY] Reason for late appeal - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: [CY] Tell us why your appeal is late
yourAppealIsOverOneYearLate: [CY] Your appeal is over one year late. That usually means you can’t appeal.
appealMayGoAheadForGoodReason: [CY] Your appeal may still be able to go ahead but only if there’s a good reason for it being late. Your reason will be reviewed before your appeal is accepted.
noGoodReasonWhyLate: [CY] I don’t have a good reason why my appeal is late

error.required: [CY] If you want to appeal, you must say why your appeal is late
error.notEnough: [CY] You have not provided enough information. Write a little more about why your appeal is late.
error.invalid: [CY] You've entered a special character. Delete it before continuing
